mapper.select: SELECT stu_id FROM studio WHERE name = #{name};
SELECT category_id AS categoryId FROM studio_category WHERE category_name = #{categoryName}

select s.stu_id,s.com_id,s.category_id,s.name,s.description,s.rule, ctg.category_id,ctg.category_name, com.name,com.logo_img, sf.size,sf.options,sf.parking,sf.unit_price,sf.default_capacity,sf.excharge, t.tag_id,t.tag from studio s join studio_category ctg on s.category_id=ctg.category_id join company com on s.com_id=com.com_id join studio_filter sf on s.stu_id=sf.stu_id left join tag t on s.stu_id=t.stu_id where s.stu_id=${value};
select re.review_id, re.cust_id, re.stu_id, re.content, re.img, re.reg_date, re.answer from review re where re.stu_Id=${list[0]} and re.cust_Id=${list[1]}
select count(res.res_id) from reservation res group by res.stu_id having res.stu_id=${value};
